notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration [grant number FDABAA-15-00121], Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs DGCS [grant number MAECI 10680], the Italian Ministry of Health [‘Ricerca Corrente’ and ‘Ricerca Finalizzata’], and the European Union’s research and innovation programmes Horizon 2020 EVIDENT [grant number 666100], EVAg [grant number 653316] and EbolaMoDRAD IMI project [grant number 115843].
